data.text: @SenRonJohnson You stand on low moral ground when it comes to this discussion.  If you really believed in coming together you would stand up to the demogauge that is in the White House.  You are NOTHING but a partisan shrill and counting your kickbacks from Koch Brothers and all the like!
@SenRonJohnson https://t.co/0A83LS4xtT
@SenRonJohnson I hope everyone we can all figure out how we can come together!
@SenRonJohnson Thanks to McCain I can still buy insurance.   You tried to kill it, so fuck right off.
@SenRonJohnson Traitor and hypocrite
@SenRonJohnson https://t.co/4ThFOdeyCH
@SenRonJohnson https://t.co/A71MWwCx24
@SenRonJohnson I guess you are referring to working together with the Russians, Comrade Johnson.

@SenRonJohnson That's funny coming from you, comrade.

McCain was fighting against Russia, while you go to Russia to get marching orders from the Russian mafia. On U.S. Independence Day, none the less.

We aren't going to forget.

Fuck. You.
@SenRonJohnson Politics aside, I think your answers here are apt and beyond socially decent. Thank you for representing our state in this way, on this day.
@RedheadBryan @ldfreimund @SenRonJohnson "Feisty" = He disagreed with me on occasion, but calling him a piece of shit and a blood traitor would be bad form.

@RedheadBryan @SenRonJohnson There's no way I'm not muted.

Ron - I didn't forget you were tagged in here still, you should absolutely shut it on the off chance I'm not.
@ldfreimund @SenRonJohnson I'm relatively certain you are on some lists by this point. I appreciate the tenacity.
@SenRonJohnson Too bad you never think about how we can come together
@SenRonJohnson Now if only you had principles and integrity to work across the aisle.
@SenRonJohnson Ladies and gentlemen: #hypocricy at its best.

@SenRonJohnson Oh shit I thought you mighta been talking about YOUR life until I read that "well lived" part.

Anyways, good talk, and you should shut it, Ron.
@SenRonJohnson Something @SenRonJohnson should emulate

@SenRonJohnson Please stop with your BS you huge hypocrite.  You're one of  Trump's biggest sycophants and you wouldn't know bipartisanship if your life depended on it.
#swamp
@SenRonJohnson His true colors came out when he published the invitation list for his funeral.
@SenRonJohnson Come together...?!  Sure about that?
@SenRonJohnson Your lack of self awareness is breathtaking. Oh, and people really, really dislike you Ron honey.
@SenRonJohnson God tells us not to judge!  We are only known by our works! You Mr Johnson are in trouble!  Your words dont back your actions!
@SenRonJohnson McCain worked with Democrats...you struggle with that concept.
@SenRonJohnson You are a bully and you would have disgusted John McCain
@SenRonJohnson Bipartisan is the word you were searching for and sent something you’ve failed at doing
@SenRonJohnson Your a fine one Ronnie taking about how  people should come together, with the the crap u say and do in front of a camera and mic. HYPOCRATE.
@SenRonJohnson All of you scum buckets in the house & senate needs to keep Senator McCain name out of your treasonous mouth..
@SenRonJohnson You're a co-equal branch of government. Do your job!!!!
@SenRonJohnson And a time for the #GOP to start living and practicing his values. Do your job. Follow your Oath of Office.
@SenRonJohnson You’re in my district. You represent nothing that reflects coming together.
@SenRonJohnson "... And now to discuss senator McCain's legacy we have a senator who will be forgotten the second he leaves office..."
@SenRonJohnson Much that you can learn from him, Senator. Not holding out much hope, though.
@g0t_86d @SenRonJohnson This message was meant for the Russians.
@SenRonJohnson You meant this message for the Russians, right?

@SenRonJohnson Hey, dick: It's possibly *never* going to be a good time for you to invite comparisons to McCain, a man who suffered torture for 5 years to avoid selling out his countryfolk, you know, like YOU did.
@SenRonJohnson Dude, you spent Independence Day in Russia.

@SenRonJohnson Honor Sen McCain by doing the right things from now on. No more going to Russia.  Vote no for Kavanaugh.  Hold the President accountable.  Hold yourself accountable to represent Wisconsin and not Russia.
@SenRonJohnson Like his treatment of Palin?

@SenRonJohnson Shamefully... you cannot endorse the @POTUS using the DOJ and FBI as his political weapon to go after his foes.   WRONG on all levels.  The @GOP needs to get a BACKBONE and hold his President accountable to the American people and the Constitution.
@SenRonJohnson So happy John chose Russ Feingold to be a pall bearer and not a Russian agent!
@SenRonJohnson And he did not mean with Putin #GOPTraitors https://t.co/Lw8w2tPPan
@SenRonJohnson Something you will never say.
@SenRonJohnson He would of never traveled to Russia to meet with Putin’s henchmen....he stood with the Russian people...especially on The 4th of July....😡😡😡😡
@SenRonJohnson Meanwhile you have done everything in your power to obstruct the will of the people. Go back to Russia.
@SenRonJohnson Stand up to Trump.
@SenRonJohnson Nam Traitor and a bitter old man...😪
